# package_name

Description. 
The package image_processing is used to:
	 Processing
			- Histogram matching
			- Structural similarity
			- Resize image 
	 Skills:
			- Read image
			- Save image
			- Plot image
			- Plot result
			- Plot histogram

## Installation

Use the package manager [pip](https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/) to install image_processing

```bash
pip image_processing
```
